channel.title: ItemOnDeath glitch?
channel.description:
[b]Well, I've noticed that when you click on 'Items Kept On Death', it doesn't show what you keep on death. Since my server is based on Economy and Pking, this is a big problem... How do I fix this?[/b]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2a6a44y.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Edit:[/u]My source + Client is Hybrid V3 PVP base. It's 317 loading 525[/b]

item.title: ItemOnDeath glitch?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

You would need to calculate the kept items-on-death then send them to the interface.

Read full topic

item.title: ItemOnDeath glitch?

item.description:
